title: Movistar Saved Nairo Quintana, Now Can He Return the Favor to Secure Team’s WorldTour Future?
content:
Nairo Quintana extends Movistar deal, setting sights on WorldTour hunt for 2025 and helping Mas: 'Support Enric in grand tours and securing the highest points possible.'

Read the full article at Movistar Saved Nairo Quintana, Now Can He Return the Favor to Secure Team’s WorldTour Future? on Velo.
author: ahood
